text: Valery Vasilyevich Gerasimov (; born 8 September 1955) is a Russian General of the Army. He is the current Chief of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation. He was appointed by President Vladimir Putin on 9 November 2012. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Russian generals Category:People from Kazan
title: Valery Gerasimov
